Exhibitions

current DE_CANTINA The exhibition DE_CANTINA is located in the computer game COUNTER-STRIKE: GLOBAL OFFENSIVE on a server named "DE_CANTINA_OFFICIAL"
previous Symmetrical Floundering Symmetrical Floundering is the first show with polish artist duo Inside Job in Denmark
previous New Other Odd / Juxtapose At Juxtapose Art Fair Cantina has invited the association New Other Odd to host a program consisting of screenings and debates.
previous Skáles Cantina presents the performance series Skáles and the exhibition Skáles (Echo). From the 5th to the 7th of June, Cantina will host the performance series Skáles and the one-day exhibition Skáles (Echo) with Sall Lam Toro, Sigrid Lerche, Mycelium, Christian Bang and Raido Rafn.
previous ☠ or Glory 1.05 – 30.05.2021. The show is curated by Jean-Baptiste Janisset and will bring together four french artists based in Marseille
previous Just a Sip - covered with a face Udstillingen Just a sip – covered with a face er den første udstilling på Cantina og dermed også en åbningsfest for stedet og fejring af medlemmerne, der har etableret det.
